alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 7:09PM CDT until April 15 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union County in south central Arkansas... Southeastern Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Atlanta, or 16 miles northwest of Junction City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Norphlet, Huttig, Junction City, Strong, Calion, Mount Holly, Atlanta, Wesson, Village, Lisbon, Urbana, Lawson, Lapile, Moro Bay State Park, Felsenthal, Newell, New London, Pigeon Hill and Spotville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
